item.title: Enabling Comments in Hugo with Isso
item.author: blog@lordyod.com
item.dc:creator: Lord Yod
item.description: There are a lot of great reasons to use a static site. One of the challenges for a blog based on a static site generator like Hugo is incorporating a comment system. In this post, we’ll walk through adding a comment system using Isso, a self-hosted and open-source comment library.
